thread.title: Sand sells: The Caribbean’s best tourism slogans
thread.title_full: Sand sells: The Caribbean’s best tourism slogans

author: Editor
title: Sand sells: The Caribbean’s best tourism slogans
text:
Posted on August 21, 2015 by Editor 
You don’t really need to sell people on a Caribbean vacation. Sun, sand, surf and tremendous cultural heritage tend to be enough to convince travelers to enjoy Haiti, Jamaica, St. Lucia or any of the myriad Caribbean locales that draw perennial interest. That being said, most Caribbean nations have a tourism slogan. Far from a simple pitch, these pithy catchphrases try to capture an entire country’s cultural tradition and natural beauty in fewer characters than your average tweet. In light of that challenge, click through the carousel above to see 27 of our favorite Caribbean tourism slogans. 
Looking for more fun Caribbean facts? Click through the carousel below to see the region’s 20 largest islands.
